title: [Bug 101187] Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even when the key is left blank in the properties file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the properties file 
2. Leave the key blank, but add a valid value 
3. Save the file 
4. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title
